jobDetails.title: Senior Scientist/NLP/Machine Learning/Data Mining Professional
jobDetails.jobDescription:
Major responsibilities:

- Use statistics, NLP and machine learning techniques to create scalable solutions for business problems

- Analyze and extract relevant information from large amounts of both structured and unstructured data to help automate and optimize key processes

- Design, experiment and evaluate highly innovative models for predictive learning

- Work closely with software engineering teams to drive real-time model experiments, implementations and new feature creations

- Work closely with operations staff to optimize various business operations

- Establish scalable, efficient, automated processes for large scale data analyses, model development, model validation and model implementation

- Track general business activity and provide clear, compelling management reporting on a regular basis

- Research and implement novel machine learning and statistical approaches

Basic Qualifications:

- A MS in CS, Machine Learning NLP, Statistics, Operational Research or in a highly quantitative field

- 3+ years of hands-on experience in predictive modeling and large data analysis

- 3+ years of experience using RSAS and SQL in a LinuxUNIX environment

- 3+ years of experience with Python

- Strong communication and data presentation skills

- Strong problem solving ability

Preferred Qualifications:

- A PhD in CS, Machine Learning NLP, Statistics, Operational Research or in a highly quantitative field

- 5+ years of industry experience in predictive modeling and large data analysis

- Strong skills with Python and JavaC++

- 1+ year distributed programming experience

Machine Learning Scientist

Major responsibilities:

- Use machine learning, data mining and statistical techniques to create new, scalable solutions for business problems

- Analyze and extract relevant information from large amounts of Amazon's historical business data to help automate and optimize key processes

- Design, develop and evaluate highly innovative models for predictive learning

- Establish scalable, efficient, automated processes for large scale data analyses, model development, model validation and model implementation

- Research and implement novel machine learning and statistical approaches

Basic Qualifications

- An MS PhD in CS, Machine Learning, Operational research, Statistics or in a highly quantitative field. PhD strongly preferred.

- Industrial experience in predictive modeling and analysis, predictive software development

- Strong Problem solving ability

- Good skills with Java or C++, PerlPython (or similar scripting language)

- Experience in using R, Matlab, or any other statistical software

- Experience in mentoring junior team members, and guiding them on machine learning and data modeling applications

- Strong communication and data presentation skills

Preferred Qualifications :

- 2-10 years of industrial experience in predictive modeling and analysis, predictive software development

- Experience handling gigabyte and terabyte size datasets

- Experience working with retail or e-commerce data

- Experience working with distributed systems and grid computing

- Publications or presentation in recognized Machine Learning and Data Mining journalsconferences

jobDetails.tagsAndSkills: Big Data,Java,C++,R,Predictive modeling and analysis,Statistical software,Data Mining,Perl
jobDetails.jobDescription:

jobDetails.title: Python developer
jobDetails.tagsAndSkills: Performance management,data science,Analytical,Retail banking,Javascript,HTML,test driven development,ITG
jobDetails.jobDescription:
• Purpose: Responsible for the Development and Maintenance of OLS application which is a BNP Paribas group Liquidity reporting application.

  • Scope: ISPL based PMLS IT Development team. Responsibility for the IT development and enhancement of PMLS applications

Responsibilities

  • Develop and enhance Dashboard and web application as assigned by team lead.
  • Contribute and propose changes to application design.
  • Creating products that are user-friendly, effective and appealing
  • Contribute to develop, maintain and improve in house python applications.
  • Meeting with the project lead to discuss requirements and/or project progress
  • Keeping up to date with recent technological and software developments
  • Developing skills and expertise in appropriate software/programming languages Python, Pyspark, Dash , HTML and Javascript
  • Working as part of a multidisciplinary team

Technical Behavioral Competencies

Essential

  • Experience developing and using RESTFull APIs
  • Expert knowledge of Flask API, FASTAPI
  • Good knowledge of Flask, html and JavaScript.
  • Strong experience in Python Data science library(including Pandas and Numpy)
  • Strong experience using pyspark for distributed computing.
  • Good knowledge of DASH/Plotly libraries.
  • Good knowledge of Python including the ability to create and maintain projects and classes
  • Experience with tools like Celery, Nginx, Gunicorn etc.
  • Experience of Full development life cycle
  • Excellent attention to details
  • Good development skills with proven track record
  • Very high level of motivation
  • Strong communication skills.
  • A positive and collaborative attitude

Preferred

  • Interests in finance topics
  • Test driven development (TDD)
  • Knowledge of DevOps

jobDetails.title: Senior Python developer / Python Lead  Role
jobDetails.jobDescription:
Hi ,


This is Shruthi R from AppviewX Talent Acquisition team . we have great opportunities in Senior Python developer / Python Lead  role. Below is the detailed description of the opportunity ,

Interested candidates Share their updated Resume at shruthi.ramakrishnaiah@appviewx.com.

Current CTC:

Expected CTC:

Notice period details: LWD if serving

Current location:

Preferred location:



Must have skills:

Network Automation

Python scripting / coding or Ansible Scripting / coding - Hands on

Django/ Flask framework 

Front end technologies - Java script, jQuery , Angular Js , React Js ( Any one) 

Networking Automation / Networking 

Notice period: Immediate to 30 days

Job Location: Chennai, Pune - Work from office- Hybrid

Years of Exp: 5+


ROLE AND RESPONSIBILITIES



• Write and maintain software to solve complex network management and monitoring tasks, including

o Deploying and auditing configuration of network devices.

o Monitoring network health, including metrics collection, visualization, and alerting

o Tracking network utilization over time to assist capacity planning models.

o Executing Changes in bulk across multiple devices.

• Write proper tests and documentation for all tools.

• Collaborate with other teams to design and implement tools that help automate end-to-end processes that involve the network infrastructure.

• Integrate existing open-source software tools and participate in those open source projects in order to contribute to any new features or bug fixes.



QUALIFICATIONS:


MUST-HAVE:

• 4+ years of software engineering experience

• Hands-on experience and good knowledge on Python Programming 

• The Candidate should be good in any one of the frameworks - Django/ Flask and should have hands-on experience in one of the python frameworks

• The candidate must have knowledge from any one of the front-end like AngularJs / React JS / Jquery/ JavaScript.

• Strong communication skills

• A desire to continue learning

• A personal commitment to quality


GOOD To HAVE 


• Ansible Knowledge is good to have but not Mandatory

• Networking knowledge is good to have but not Mandatory.
